channel.title: PMs sent twice
channel.description:
I'm currently developing a client and server for my friend that is based on this: [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,520684.html]Zepsity great PI[/url]
and I've noticed, when you send a PM, to the user that sent the pm, it looks like it sent twice but the receiving user only receives it once. Also on the quest tab, it says "Players online" that displays the correct amount of users, but doing ::players doubles that count.
Does anyone know of a fix?
EDIT: Fixed the player online bug. If anyone knows about the PM sent twice issue, let me know please.
